{{short description|Adûnaic word}}
'''gimli''', '''igmil''' means "star-shaped figure" in [[Adûnaic]]. Coll. pl. '''gimil''' "starry sky".

==Etymology==
Perhaps related to [[Khuzdul]] ''[[kibil]]'' "silver"

==Examples==
*[[Ar-Gimilzôr|Gimilzôr]]
*[[Gimilkhâd]]
*[[Gimlad]]
*[[Gimilnitîr]]
*[[Gimilzagar]]
